EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Service__c.Contact_First_Name__c}â€‹,
Hope your week is going great! I wanted to follow up on the previous email. Utah Real Estate / Wasatch Front Regional MLS, Inc. requires agents to initiate the IDX Request process. Here is the instruction sheet that outlines the required step and helps with the paperwork process: Instructions.
Let me know if you have any questions. I'm here to help!
Best Regards,
